casebody.data:
Raymond R. SMITH, Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
CITIZENS INSURANCE COMPANY OF AMERICA, Intervening Plaintiff,
v.
Chrysler Group, LLC, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157382
COA: 339705 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the January 31, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered and, pursuant to MCR 7.305(H)(1), in lieu of granting leave to appeal, we REMAND this case to the Court of Appeals for consideration as on leave granted.
